title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Product Name: Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs

Introducing the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, your ultimate companion for hearing protection at the shooting range. These earmuffs are equipped with high-definition speakers, ensuring crystal clear audio at all times.

The sound-activated compression feature boasts an impressive reaction time of just 0.02 seconds, providing instant protection against loud noises. The independent volume controls allow you to adjust each ear cup separately, offering a personalized hearing experience.

With a noise reduction rating of 23 dB, these earmuffs effectively minimize loud sounds, ensuring your ears are well-protected. The earmuffs are fitted with two omnidirectional microphones, enhancing your situational awareness by allowing you to hear sounds from all directions.

The earmuffs come with an audio input jack, enabling you to connect to external devices. The volume control is designed with recessed knobs, ensuring easy adjustments without accidentally changing the settings.

Powered by two AAA batteries (included), these earmuffs offer reliable and long-lasting performance. The earmuffs measure 8.1 inches in length, 4.6 inches in width, and 10.6 inches in height, with a weight of just 0.98 pounds, ensuring they are lightweight and comfortable for extended use.

The headband is designed for comfort, featuring a metal wire frame that provides sturdy support. The headband is also foldable, making the earmuffs easy to store and transport. The housing is made of composite material, offering excellent sound dampening capabilities.

Experience superior hearing protection and comfort with the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs.
